name: Multi-Agent Orchestration
author: Huitzo
description: Spawn and coordinate multiple AI agents to tackle complex workflows in parallel. Perfect for research tasks, competitive analysis, data gathering, and any job that requires distributed intelligence at scale.
features: Spawn multiple specialized AI agents on demand
Coordinate parallel workflows with intelligent task distribution
Real-time agent status monitoring and progress tracking
Automatic failure recovery and agent reallocation
Result synthesis and aggregation from multiple sources
Cost optimization through intelligent agent scheduling

commands.name: agents.workflow.start
commands.description: Launch multi-agent workflow for complex tasks

commands.name: agents.results
commands.description: Retrieve and synthesize results from workflow
